description:
Zanya reveals the results of his investigation into the Chaos Company. Geargod 099 sends a duplicate of Gao to infiltrate his home and school, resulting in an attack on Student Council President Shido. Shido challenges Gao to a Buddyfight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A New Buddy! The Clockwork Mighty Sun Fighter!!
Arata na Buddy! Kikaiji Kake no Taiyou Banchou!!
新たなバディ! 機械じかけの太陽番長!!
